body:
Think this kaientai dude is trying to compete with legendary Saigado of KoF.
Just give it up before #6.
Cuz with this shitty found hypno app by kensuke?4 real?
Suzuhara ok.but anyone but Aida.
Guy is able to craft a device of his own thru spying on Nerv akagis lab or sumthing.
With a plot like that he cant hold a candle to not even Bakuhatsu Fusen let alone Saigado.
That afterword is really interesting, he really nailed the appeal.
I fucking love this chapter cant stop fapping to it
